subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Philanthropy
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mr. Pollin, the owner of the N.B.A.’s Washington Wizards who built the sports arena that revitalized downtown Washington, was known for his wide-ranging philanthropy.
snippet: Mr. Pollin, the owner of the N.B.A.’s Washington Wizards who built the sports arena that revitalized downtown Washington, was known for his wide-ranging philanthropy.
